title: Storj mount: can't open copied file, bucket is missing
body:
This issue is mostly for reference, I suppose I or a collegue from Storj will make a PR.

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

```
$ cd /mnt/storj-buckets/mvtest
$ ls
LICENSE  LICENSE2
$ cp LICENSE LICENSE4
$ cat LICENSE4
cat: LICENSE4: Input/output error
```

I can download the file after re-mounting.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
rclone v1.58.1
- os/version: arch (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 5.17.4-arch1-1 (x86_64)
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.18.1
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: none
```

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Storj

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
$ rclone mount -vvv --debug-fuse storj:/ /mnt/storj-buckets
```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

Essential part: 

```
uplink: bucket name invalid ("")
```

full output:

```
2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : fuse: <- Open [ID=0x5a Node=0x6 Uid=1000 Gid=1000 Pid=654199] dir=false fl=OpenReadOnly
2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : mvtest/LICENSE4: Open: flags=OpenReadOnly
2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : mvtest/LICENSE4: Open: flags=O_RDONLY
2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : mvtest/LICENSE4: >Open: fd=mvtest/LICENSE4 (r), err=<nil>

2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : mvtest/LICENSE4: Attr:

2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : fuse: -> [ID=0x5c] Getattr valid=1s ino=17695086616704760723 size=34523 mode=-rw-r--r--
2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : fuse: <- Read [ID=0x5e Node=0x6 Uid=1000 Gid=1000 Pid=654199] 0x1 36864 @0x0 dir=false fl=0 owner=0 ffl=OpenReadOnly
2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : &{mvtest/LICENSE4 (r)}: Read: len=36864, offset=0

2022/05/05 01:46:38 DEBUG : /LICENSE4: range 0 + 134217728
```

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
